testsuite.test:
Is xAxis a number
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

Is yAxis a number
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

Is zAxis a number
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

Verify the values for x z and y are different
Instructions: 1) Click 'GO'! 2) Move the phone while the test is running, to generate different values.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

MUST SUCCEED Initial position test flat on the table
Instructions: 1) Place the phone flat on the table, display facing upwards. 2) Click 'GO'!
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

Check tight range flat on the table
Instructions: 1) Place the phone flat on the table, display facing upwards. 2) Make sure it's really on a flat table, may use a gauge to ensure so. 3) This test will be very pedantic! 4) Click 'GO'!
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

Tilt RIGHT xAxis
Instructions: 1) Click 'Go' 2) Move the phone to the initial position. 3) Within 10 seconds, tilt phone 90 degrees to the RIGHT.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

Tilt LEFT xAxis
Instructions: 1) Click 'Go' 2) Move the phone to the initial position. 3) Within 10 seconds, tilt phone 90 degrees to the LEFT.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

Tilt FORWARD zAxis
Instructions: 1) Click 'Go' 2) Move the phone to the initial position. 3) Within 10 seconds, tilt phone 90 degrees FORWARD.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

Tilt BACKWARD zAxis
Instructions: 1) Click 'Go' 2) Move the phone to the initial position. 3) Within 10 seconds, tilt phone 90 degrees BACKWARDS.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

Tilt UPSIDE DOWN zAxis
Instructions: 1) Click 'Go' 2) Move the phone to the initial position. 3) Within 10 seconds, hold the phone facing downwards.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

Facing me yAxis
Instructions: 1) Click 'Go' 2) Move the phone to the initial position. 3) Within 10 seconds, hold the phone facing towards you.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

Facing me upside down yAxis
Instructions: 1) Click 'Go' 2) Move the phone to the initial position. 3) Within 10 seconds, hold the phone facing towards you but upside down.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.
